text: Louis Zorich (February 12, 1924 - January 30, 2018) was an American actor. He was perhaps best known to television audiences for his roles of Paul Reiser's father, Burt Buchman, on the NBC series Mad About You.Yahoo! Movies: Louis Zorich Biography. Retrieved October 21, 2007. He played the role from 1993 to 1999.
